text: Sibel Siber (born 13 December 1960) is a Turkish Cypriot politician. She was the Prime Minister of Northern Cyprus between 13 June 2013 and 2 September 2013. She was the first female Prime Minister. Siber was the Speaker of Parliament, the Assembly of the Republic of Northern Cyprus from 2013 to 2018. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Northern Cyprus Category:Speakers of the Assembly of Northern Cyprus
title: Sibel Siber
